level.heading: ENFORCEMENT; CRIMINAL PENALTIES; PROSECUTION BY THE CORPORATION COUNSEL (ยง7-1711)

level.text: An athlete agent that violates ยง 1710 of this chapter is guilty of a misdemeanor and, upon conviction, is punishable by maximum fine of ten thousand dollars ($10,000) or imprisonment for six (6) months, or both. The Corporation Counsel shall prosecute violations of ยง 1711 in the name of the District of Columbia.
